rewrite1:

- In the tenth paragraph, apply a lime-colored highlight to the text and choose a heavy wave style for the underline.

- When you get to the seventh paragraph, increase the space before it to 0.5 cm and set the space after to the equivalent of 3 lines. Change the font size to 10.5 points and use the highlight function with the color corresponding to the hex code #FF00FF.
